            token_key=token_key, wait=wait
        )
    
        if "logistics-objects?" in url or "access-delegations" in url:
            loid = ''.join(re.findall(r'[a-zA-Z]+', name))
            yaml_util.write_extract_yaml({loid: LogistObject.headers.get("Location")})
